```{r}
StuDF <- data.frame(
  學號=c(172,214,322,425,517),
  姓名=c("小明","大雄","胖虎","小新","大白"),
  成績=c(80,60,90,70,50)
  )
StuDF 
```

```{r}
class(StuDF)
typeof(StuDF)
```

```{r}
StuDF[[2]][[3]]
```
#data.frame()遇到變數輸入為character class時，內定會被轉成factor
```{r}
class(StuDF$姓名)
```

```{r}
StuDF$姓名 <- as.character(StuDF$姓名)
class(StuDF$姓名)
```
#取消內定character為factor的方式
```{r}
StuDF2 <- data.frame(
  學號=c(172,214,322,425,517),
  姓名=c("小明","大雄","胖虎","小新","大白"),
  成績=c(80,60,90,70,50),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
  )
StuDF2 
```

```{r}
class(StuDF2$姓名)
```
